sessions.title: Monetization Strategies for Insurtechs
sessions.description: Monetization is one of the biggest challenges for insurtechs and insurance service providers at every stage of growth. From early-stage startups struggling to price their first offering to established companies looking to optimize revenue streams.

sessions.title: Insurance Leaders Summit
sessions.description: Insurance leaders: the cards are on the table. Amid rising premiums, decreasing customer satisfaction, and tightening regulations – the cost of doing business is skyrocketing.

sessions.title: AI-Powered Underwriting and Agentic Automation
sessions.description: Discover how leading insurers are transforming their operations through AI-powered underwriting, agentic automation across the policy lifecycle, and strategic legacy technology modernization.

sessions.title: Performance Marketing for Insurance Growth
sessions.description: Performance marketing is the main lever for increasing your book of business. But it's daunting. What works, what doesn't? We identify simple things you can be doing to give you an edge.

sessions.title: Wholesale Distribution Tech Revolution
sessions.description: Is wholesale distribution finally having its tech moment? Explore how wholesale brokers, MGAs, and capacity providers are using AI-driven tools to enable smarter decision-making.

sessions.title: Corporate Development Summit
sessions.description: Designed exclusively for corporate development, strategy, and innovation executives, this summit explores key insurance industry trends, including macroeconomic shifts, strategic M&A.

sessions.title: State Farm Startup Pitch Competition
sessions.description: Join us for the fourth annual State Farm Startup Pitch Competition. Launched in 2022, the competition highlights groundbreaking innovation in insurtech.

sessions.title: Specialty Lines Innovation
sessions.description: Specialty lines are no longer a niche, they're the frontier. As risks evolve and clients demand more nuanced coverage, brokers have a golden opportunity to lead with expertise.

sessions.title: Opening Night Reception
sessions.description: Where innovation takes center stage and connections begin to spark! Join us for the evening as we kickoff ITC Vegas with our opening night reception!

sessions.title: First Timers Expo Tour
sessions.description: First Timers, this one is for you! Join the ITC Vegas team for an exclusive tour of the Expo Floor.

sessions.title: Expo Floor Opens
sessions.description: The Expo Floor is your realm of innovation, where you'll connect with industry leaders, explore cutting-edge solutions, and form valuable partnerships.

sessions.title: Climate Volatility and Property Risk
sessions.description: As climate volatility increases and property risks become more complex, insurers are under pressure to respond faster, act smarter, and deliver more consistent outcomes.

sessions.title: Personalized Insurance with AI
sessions.description: Customers are no longer satisfied with generic policies and cookie-cutter service. They expect insurance tailored to their needs, behaviors, and risks—in real time.

sessions.title: Battle for Direct Customer Access
sessions.description: Insurers, brokers, MGAs, insurtechs, and even big tech companies are all vying for the same thing: direct access to the customer.

sessions.title: High-Volume Claims and Fraud
sessions.description: Claim leaders for high-volume carriers face an impossible math problem: tens of thousands of open injury claims, growing fraud exposure, and not nearly enough resources.

sessions.title: Zywave's Agentic AI Demo
sessions.description: Zywave's Agentic AI workflows elevate insurance operations, enhance decision-making with real-time data, and foster seamless collaboration.

sessions.title: Insurance Data Network and AI Against Fraud
sessions.description: In an era when fraud costs the P&C insurance industry nearly $122 billion annually, leveraging shared data and advanced AI technologies is critical.

sessions.title: Commercial Insurance Revolution
sessions.description: For years, billions have flowed into insurtech, yet commercial insurance remained a fortress of complexity. But now, the barriers are cracking.

sessions.title: Multi-Cancer Early Detection Impact
sessions.description: Early detection of cancer has the potential to radically reshape healthcare costs, outcomes, and insurance models.

sessions.title: Workday for Insurance Demo
sessions.description: Workday is a leading enterprise platform that helps organizations manage their most important assets – their people and money.

sessions.title: Convergence of Health and Wealth
sessions.description: Group benefits, life and annuities and health coverage were built for a fragmented past. But in today's world, where health affects wealth, jobs affect longevity and wellbeing is a lifelong journey.

sessions.title: Big Tech's Insurance Invasion
sessions.description: Big Tech is no longer circling insurance—it's making its move. From Amazon's embedded protections to Google's AI-driven risk models and Apple's health data integrations.

sessions.title: Claims Innovation Fireside Chat
sessions.description: A long, frustrating claims process is no longer acceptable in a world where consumers expect instant gratification.

sessions.title: Agentic AI in Commercial Insurance
sessions.description: AI agents are gaining momentum across industries, but what does this mean for the complex, relationship-centric commercial insurance space?

sessions.title: AI Arms Race in Fraud Detection
sessions.description: Fraudsters are evolving faster than ever, using deepfakes and AI-generated evidence to manipulate claims.

sessions.title: Future of Actuaries in AI Era
sessions.description: For centuries, actuaries have been the backbone of insurance, using statistical models and risk assessment to shape the industry.

sessions.title: Insurance M&A Trends
sessions.description: The insurance industry's deal-making machine is in full swing, with strategic acquisitions, blockbuster mergers, and insurtech consolidations reshaping the landscape.

sessions.title: Early Intervention in Health Insurance
sessions.description: Early intervention isn't just good medicine, it's good business. As healthcare costs surge, health insurers are redesigning plans to prioritize prevention.

sessions.title: ManyPets: Data-Driven Strategy
sessions.description: At ManyPets, data isn't just a function, it's a mindset. The CEO and Chief Data Officer share how they've embedded data at the heart of their strategy.

sessions.title: Lunch on Expo Floor
sessions.description: Explore grab-and-go lunch options right on the Expo Floor, join a curated lunch seminar for deeper insights, or discover the many wonders throughout the Expo.

sessions.title: Behavioral Insurance and Loss Prevention
sessions.description: The future of insurance isn't just about reacting to claims—it's about preventing losses, reducing friction, and building trust in real time.

sessions.title: Channel-First Insurance Design
sessions.description: Most insurers start with a product, then look for a channel. But what happens when you start with the channel — a brand with scale, user trust, and distribution built in.

sessions.title: EOX Vantage Commercial Insurance Demo
sessions.description: Commercial insurance is complex—submission volumes are high, requirements are rigorous. EOX Vantage simplifies this complexity.

sessions.title: Convr AI Underwriting Demo
sessions.description: Convr is a modularized AI underwriting, data, and intelligent document processing workbench that enriches and expedites commercial insurance.

sessions.title: Expo Floor Happy Hour
sessions.description: Unwind and connect at our Expo Floor Happy Hour! Experience a lively atmosphere featuring musical performances, engaging activations, a biergarten, and so much more.

sessions.title: Expo Floor Opens
sessions.description: The Expo Floor is your realm of innovation, where you'll connect with industry leaders, explore cutting-edge solutions, and form valuable partnerships.

sessions.title: Trust in AI Risk Models
sessions.description: AI and advanced analytics are revolutionizing risk modeling, but there's one big problem—can insurers, regulators, and customers actually trust the outputs?

sessions.title: Future of Broker-Carrier Partnerships
sessions.description: For decades, the broker-carrier partnership has been the backbone of insurance distribution. But as embedded insurance, digital MGAs, and direct-to-consumer platforms gain traction.

sessions.title: Intelligent Automation in Claims
sessions.description: Manual processes continue to be a major bottleneck in the claim lifecycle, but modern tools can apply intelligent automation to help reduce leakage.

sessions.title: Agentic AI Digital Workforce
sessions.description: Agentic AI solutions are transforming insurance by creating a digital workforce that enables employees and customers to form meaningful relationships.

sessions.title: AI vs Human in Commercial Underwriting
sessions.description: AI is advancing fast, but is it ready to take the wheel in complex commercial underwriting? Proponents argue that AI can process vast datasets, detect hidden risks.

sessions.title: Life & Health Underwriting Revolution
sessions.description: The underwriting revolution is here, fueled by real-time data, AI, and shifting consumer expectations.

sessions.title: Higson Product Configurator Demo
sessions.description: Join us and discover how Higson (by Decerto) - the product configurator trusted by Allianz, Aviva, Sompo, and Gulf Insurance Group - shrinks change cycles from months to just days.

sessions.title: AI-Powered Claims Adjusters
sessions.description: Despite all the talk of automation, human expertise is still at the heart of the claims process. But what if AI could make adjusters faster, smarter, and more effective?

sessions.title: Digital-First Distribution Strategies
sessions.description: Forget outdated sales tactics—today's insurance buyers demand speed, simplicity, and relevance.

sessions.title: Flowable Agentic AI Platform
sessions.description: Discover how one of the top 10 U.S. P&C insurers is reimagining its operational backbone using agentic AI and intelligent process orchestration.

sessions.title: AI Agents in Life & Benefits
sessions.description: Life insurance, annuity, and group benefits carriers are deploying AI agents to revolutionize operations from policy administration to claims adjudication.

sessions.title: First 100 Days of Customer Experience
sessions.description: The moment a customer buys a policy, the clock starts ticking. The first 100 days define whether they'll stay engaged—or start shopping for their next insurer.

sessions.title: Claims Process Transformation
sessions.description: The claims process is being transformed like never before—AI-powered fraud detection, real-time data, and straight-through processing are making faster settlements a reality.

sessions.title: Battle for Customer Loyalty
sessions.description: The battle for customer loyalty isn't just about price—it's about seamless integration, convenience, and ongoing value.

sessions.title: Real-Time Risk Assessment
sessions.description: The old way of assessing risk—static data, annual updates, and one-size-fits-all pricing—is fading fast.

sessions.title: Embedded Insurance Success Factors
sessions.description: Embedded insurance is no longer a nice-to-have—it's a major growth driver. But for every success story, there are countless failed partnerships.

sessions.title: Climate Tech Evolution
sessions.description: Climate tech in insurance has come a long way—what started as better catastrophe modeling has evolved into real-time risk prevention.

sessions.title: Specialty Insurance Evolution
sessions.description: From cyber threats and climate extremes to parametric innovations, specialty insurance is evolving at breakneck speed.

sessions.title: Financial Wellness Innovation
sessions.description: Financial wellness isn't just about savings goals or budgeting apps, it's about creating stability in a world of income volatility.

sessions.title: Hyland Content-Driven AI Demo
sessions.description: Discover Hyland's Content-Driven Agentic Applications and how the power of AI helps insurance organizations transform enterprise content.

sessions.title: Lunch on Expo Floor
sessions.description: Explore grab-and-go lunch options right on the Expo Floor, join a curated lunch seminar for deeper insights.

sessions.title: Cyber Insurance for SMEs
sessions.description: Cyber threats are escalating, yet many SMEs remain underinsured and vulnerable, often perceived as high-risk, low-reward clients by cyber insurers.

sessions.title: Future of Risk Assessment
sessions.description: With automation, AI, and climate change, the world we live in is evolving at an ever-increasing rate.

sessions.title: Evolving Group Insurance with Mike Estep
sessions.description: As workforce demographics and expectations evolve, traditional benefits packages may no longer suffice. Mike Estep explores how Prudential is adapting.

sessions.title: Cyber Insurance Evolution Keynote
sessions.description: As cyber threats escalate, insurers must continuously evolve to stay ahead. This keynote will explore how cyber insurance is adapting to an era of perpetual risk.

sessions.title: Portable Benefits for Gig Economy
sessions.description: The traditional employer-anchored benefits model is being challenged by the rise of freelance, contract, and gig work.

sessions.title: AI in Cyber Risk Quantification
sessions.description: Cyber risk is notoriously difficult to quantify, yet accurate pricing is crucial for sustainable insurance models.

sessions.title: Final Expo Floor Happy Hour
sessions.description: This is your final time to walk and enjoy the Expo Floor at ITC Vegas! Make it count by experiencing a lively atmosphere featuring musical performances.

sessions.title: Closing Party
sessions.description: You came, you saw, and you conquered ITC Vegas. Now, experience not just an epic and star-powered finish to the non-stop action.
